plot: A teenage girl from an affluent family receives a car (a Mini Cooper) that is possessed by a ghost named Marco. He brightens up her life, as well as that of her brother and her eight friends, and eventually she falls in love with him.
title: Gau go neui jai yat jek gwai
plot_es: A teenage girl from an affluent family receives a car (a Mini Cooper) that is possessed by a ghost named Marco. He brightens up her life, as well as that of her brother and her eight friends, and eventually she falls in love with him.
